7.3.1 Existence of recommendations for GWG
Two thirds of the countries (36 countries; 68%) reported the existence of national recommendations on 
appropriate weight gain during pregnancy. Around one fifth of the countries (12 countries; 23%) do not have 
GWG recommendations and five countries did not respond (Fig. 7.10).
